transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, hello?
Customer: Hello sir.
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Ha sir, good morning, good morning sir. Vilichayirunnu.
Executive: [unintelligible] sir.
Customer: A Arvind Marke, ha paranjolu sir, paranjolu sir.
Customer: Prasnnalle?
Executive: Athe athe athe, paranjolu sir.
Customer: Njan, ninte postinnalikyan njan complaint kodukkan povua.
Executive: Endu patti sir?
Customer: Njan enthanu paranjittullathu, enikku Delhi alla ningalude Chennai office-il ninnu phone vararuthu ennu njan nerathe paranjittundu.
Executive: Sir, nammude team-il ninnu aaru saarine vilikkunnilla. Saarinte profile-il ippo head office-il
Customer: Innalle, innale vilichu Balachandran ennu parannu oru payyan enneyum paranju vilichu. Um. Ppulliyum parayunnathu njan angu ividunnu vannu avide parayunnathu. Evidunna? Noida-il ninnannanna parayunnathu. Njan enthaayalum ningalude muthalaalikku ithinte ithu ellam kude chonnukkaan povua.
Executive: Sir, saarinte profile nammude Chennai team-ile illa sir, saarinte profile.
Customer: Enthinna kallam parayunnathu? Ente ithinte ithinte ithu namukku ariyaavunnathondallo. Customer supportil aaraanu? Ippo engane mohan ittu enney vilikkan kaaranam enthanu?
Customer: Njan Delhi-kku, njan ningalude Delhi office-il Noida office-ilaano njan ithu cheythathu?
Executive: Um, okay okay.
Customer: Pinnenthinna vilichu?
Executive: Sir, nammude team-il ninnu aarum vilichittilla. Saarine head office-il ninnayirikkum saarine vilichittundaavuka.
Customer: Namalum ee kallavum kallaththaratte koodaththil nadakkunnathu. Athanu business. Okay.
Executive: Sir, njan venamengil saarine njan oru
Customer: Kallam paranjulla paripaadi athu nirthaan nammal ithaanu parayunnathu.
Executive: Sir, nammude side-il ninnu kallam onnum paranjittilla. Njan saarinte profile aaraanu handle cheyyunnathu ennathullathu venam njan screenshot eduthu saarinu ayachu tharaam. Head office-il ulla oru team aanu saarine handle cheyyunnathu.
Customer: Innalle Balachandran ennu paranna payyan enthinna vilichathu? Avan parannu Noida-il ninnannannathu.
Executive: Okay. Chilappo saarinte profile angottu change cheythittullaappo enthengilum service oriented aayittayirikkum saarine vilichittundaavuka.
Customer: Illa. Aa profile change cheythittundengil ente customer ithu parayunnilla entha parayunne? Customer support officer aayittu ippolum kits ennaanu peraanu athu kidakkunnathu.
Executive: Oh, anganeyaanu? Ithuvare okay. Actually saarinte profile transfer aayi. Athu avide update aayittundaavilla ennu thonnunnu.
Customer: Enthaayaalum ithil kidakkunnathu kits enna peraanu.
Executive: Ippo saarinte number registered aayittullathu profile-il saarinnu saarinte number-il ninnu vilikkumpozhathekkum enikku athoru notification varum. Pakse ippo enikku angane oru notification-e vannittilla saaraanu vilikkunnathu ennathullathu. Njan athukondaanu chodhichathu.
Customer: Enikku ippozhum ithil kidakkunnathu kits ennaanu ningalude officer ennu paranjullathaanu kidakkunnathu.
Executive: Okay okay. Njan athu screenshot ayakkaam saar. Ippo ente kayil illa athu actually ullathu.
Customer: Nammude Arvind marketing handle cheyyunnathu. Renew cheyyano venda ennullathu inganeyokke ulla oru attitude aanengil ningalude ithaanengil pinne renew cheyyano venda ennullathu nammal aalochikkum.
Executive: Sir, njan oru kaaryam. Muthalaali ariyunnathundoo?
Customer: Urappayittum urappayittum sir. Saarinte concern enthaanengilum nammude side-il ninnathu. Cheyyunnathulla paripaadikal aanu IndiaMART-ile staff cheyyunnathu ennu ppulliyum kude ariyanam.
Executive: Okay sir, njan ottoru kaaryam paranjotte. Allaa kaaranam enthaano? Appo nerathe ariyanallo ente oru issue njan X-il nammal report cheythu. Enikku athinte kaaranam kondaanu ningalude muthalaali uththaram vannathu. Ppulli enikku mail ayachathum baakiyokke.
Customer: Aaanalle? Aha aha. Athe athe last time athe athe athe. Last time-il. Appo nammal veruthe oraale joli kalayippikkan onnumalla nokkunnathu. Pakse ithu proper aayi reethiyil venam.
Executive: Sir, urappayittum sir. Ippo njan oru kaaryam parayatte sir. Ippo ente kayilulla clients-inte ennam 140 peraanu. Ee 140 peril saarinte profile-um undaayirunnu ente kayil aadhyame. Ippo athinu shesham ee 140 perilum maasathil orikkale avarude catalog service provide cheythittu avarude keyword update cheyyanam. Athe athinte update cheythathinu shesham nammal head office-il mail ayachu report submit cheyyanam. So, saar paranje pinne njan saar ente side-il ninnu njan saarine ithuvare vilichittu polumilla. Kaaranam vilikkunnathinu vilikkaathathinte kaaranam enthaanennu vechchaal saarinte profile ente kayyil ninnu poyi. Means njan mail raise cheythittu transfer aayi saarinte profile.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Njan saarinte profile ippo ente kayyil access-e illa. Maybe avaru pazhaya reethiyilulla oru update prakaaram aayirikkum.
Customer: Kits ennu enikku kuzhappamillaayirunnu. Prasnnam enthaanennu ariyo? Ee kallaththarangal parayuka. Ippo ningalkku ee kaaryangal ariyathillenkil arinjittu venam oraale vilichu ithu cheyyaan. Njan ithrayo varshamaayittu nammal ithinte IndiaMART-inte service edukkunnathaanu. Vannittu oru divasathe oru divasam vannittu parayum online vaa vannu kude thanne cheyyunnu. Vannu ororo chumaathe stupid kaaryangal paranjittu time waste cheyyuka.
Customer: Appo anganeyokke vannappolaanu njan paranje ini mele enney vilichu poyakkanam ennu parannathu. Enthengilum aavashyamo athu illa oru oru chadanginnu ninnu cheyyunnathu. Chummathe samayam kalayuka.
Executive: Manassilaayi sir, manassilaayi. Saarinte concern enikku annu thanne saar paranjappo thanne manassilaayaayirunnu. So, athil pinneyaanu nammude team-il ninnu vere aarum saarine vilikkaanjathu thanne. Maasathil orikkale connect undaavanam. Ippo paranjallo kits enikku kuzhappamilla. Kits vilichaalum kuzhappamilla. Pakse athu genuine kaaryathinu vendi aayirikkam. Illaathe oru oru chumma oru talkinu vendi venamengil vilichayirikkam.
Executive: Urappayittum sir. Saar paranjathu manassilaayi.
Customer: Appo athukond athukondulla oru prasnnam undu. Athu ningalodulla deshyam onnumalla.
Executive: Oh, enikku manassilaayi sir. Enikku manassilaayi manassilaayi. Sir, enthaanennu vechchaal ippo saarinu enney koodaathe thanne orupaadu calls varunnittundennu enikku ariyaam. So, athu irritated enna reethiyil saarinum athu enikku ariyaam saarinte aa oru entha parayaa saarinte maanasikaavastha enikku manassilaavunnundu. Ithu pole oru call regular aayittu vannu kazhinjaal enthaanengilum namukku athu deshyam varum. Athu relevant aayittulla kaaryam alla ennullathundenkil.
Customer: Ippo chodhikkunnu enganeyundu buyleads-inte kaaryangalokke enganeyundu? Athu ellam okay aano? Aa okay aanennu paranjittu okay vekkukayaanenkil kuzhappamilla. Ithu udane thanne pinne parayunnu aduthathu veronnum online-il varaan pattumo? Online-il vannu kurache kaaryangal kude parannu tharaanundennu. Ee parannu tharunnathu nammal varshangalaayittu kettukondirikkunnathaa.
Executive: Aa athe athe.
Customer: Inganeyulla kaaryangal kondaanu parannathu vilikkenda.
Executive: Urappayittum sir, urappayittum.
Customer: Pinnenthengilum undengil namukku enthengilum paranjille cheriya doubts-ukalokke undengil ningalude aduthu chodhikkaam. Appo enthaanu vilikkunnathu?
Executive: Athe.
Customer: Athe sir athe sir.
Customer: Appo ithinte renewal-inte kaaryathinu vendiyaanu njan vilichathu.
Executive: Aaru saaru vilichatho?
Customer: Njan ningalude helpline-il vilichathu athinu vendiyaanu.
Executive: Aa haa okay okay.
Customer: Second aayittundente charges-ukal.
Executive: Oru minute njan saarinte profile onnu open cheythotte. Ente kayil access undo ennu nokkatte. Renewal eppozhaanullathu ennullathu njan nokkatte athu.
Executive: Okay, renewal renewal generate aayittundu sir nammude profile-ilekku.
Customer: Parayumbol parayanda.
Executive: Sir, kekkaamo? Aa aa kekkunnu kekkaam. Aa sir, renewal generate aayittundu nammude profile-ilekku. Oho. Okay. So, renewal ippo currently njan just oru ithaayittu parayaam sir. Ithippo ente kayilalla ennaalum njan parayuva. Ippo kazhinja praavashyam saar 28000 illayirunno nammal cheythathu? GST ellam cherthittu? Aa GST ellam cherthu 33400. Ippo currently corona-kku shesham ippo price increase aayittundu. 35000 plus GST ennulla reethiyilaayittu price increase aayittundu. Saarinte date avasaanikkunnathu January maasamaanu. January maasamaanu saar kazhinja praavashyam payment cheythittullathu.
Customer: 35000-mo?
Executive: Aa 35000 plus GST aayittu increase aayittundu. Athu saarinte portal-il thanne nokkumpo kaanaan kazhiyunnu. Dashboard click cheyyumpozhathekkum avide renewal-inte parayunna oru pop-up avide open aayittundaavum. So, athile new price
Customer: 35000 aano? Ippo ethra increase aayi?
Executive: Increase aayekunnathu oru 6000 increase aayittundu. GST ellam cherthathu varumpozhathekkum saarinu oru 40 chillarayude aduthu varum.
Customer: Cheyyunnathu? Ennaal pinne ithangu service nirthaam.
Executive: Allalla ithinu oru benefit enthaanennu vechcha kazhinjaal ippo currently management side-il ninnulla oru quota enthaanennu vechcha kazhinjaal sir ningalu already existing aayittulla oru customer aanu nammude already oru varsham nammal complete aayi aakaan pokunnundalle? Appo ee last financial year cheythirikkunna amount 28000 plus GST ennulla amount thanne saar cheythaal mathi.
Customer: Aa.
Executive: Kazhinja varsham ethra cheytha athu thanne cheythaal mathi.
Customer: Aa okay. Athu athaanu athaanu athaanu sir. Athaanu ippo ente kayilundaayirunna customers ellam ippo renewal time vannappo samayathu 28000 plus GST ennulla oru amount aanu njan avarkku approval aakki koduthittullathu. Puthiya financial price alla.
Customer: Enikkum athu mathi.
Executive: Okay so aa okay athu vechittulla oru proposal enikkonnu ayachekannathu.
Executive: Sir, athu sir athu njaanalla sir ayakkendathu. Ente kayilalla sir athinte proposal.
Customer: Eda onnu paranje njan avide onnu paray. Avide ningalude office-il onnu paray.
Executive: Njan parayaam njan parayaam. Okay njan parayaam sir. Okay okay okay. Enthengilum undengil vilichaal mathi saarinu.
Customer: Aa aa kits-inte allaathe personal number undoo athilonnu onnu onnu thanne. Njan ayakkaam njan ayakkaam ente number onnu message ayakkadaa. Okay okay sir. Thank you sir thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received calls from Delhi office.

- Wants to file a complaint about post spoiling.

- Objects to receiving unnecessary calls.

- Concerned about increased renewal price.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed profile not in Chennai team.

- Executive offered to send screenshot of profile handler.

- Executive clarified the renewal price issue.

- Executive agreed to send personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform the office about the issue.

- Executive will send personal number to customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, profile, call, complaint, price
